sentences.en: 'No, Miss Manette; all through it, I have known myself to be quite undeserving.
sentences.cn: “ 不, 曼内特小姐, 在整个梦里我都知道自己是很不配的.

sentences.en: AT THE best of times, the self-made rich are usually held up in fiction as shallow, contemptible and undeserving of sympathy even when their wealth leads to misery and ends in ruin.
sentences.cn: 最好的时代，小说里白手起家的富人一贯浅薄可鄙，倘若穷困潦倒、破败坍台，也不配得到一丝同情。

sentences.en: Feeling unworthy or undeserving of the compliment.
sentences.cn: 感到不配、不值得这份称赞.

sentences.en: He was undeserving of her affections.
I should be undeserving of the confidence you have honoured me with.
sentences.cn: 您使我荣幸地得到了信任,我实在有愧于此.

sentences.en: In this world, nothing was undeserving of the French soldiers!
sentences.cn: 这个世界上，没有一样东西是法兰西士兵所不配享有的！

sentences.en: Praise to the undeserving is severe satire.
sentences.cn: 赞美不该赞美的人是一种严厉的讽刺.

sentences.en: Such trifles are undeserving of attention.
sentences.cn: 这类鸡毛蒜皮的小事不值得注意.

sentences.en: When constitution can be amended for reservation for undeserving vote banks, then why can't law be amended to punish such bastrds who is the most brutal of the gang.
sentences.cn: 当宪法都可以被修改来保留那些不值得的投票银行时，为什么就不能修改法律来惩罚这个最最残忍的家伙。
